title: Plant biomass allocation advances our understanding of plant adaptation to environmental gradients: a commentary on ‘Contrasting biomass allocations explain adaptations to cold and drought in the world’s highest-growing angiosperms’
content: This article comments on:Jiří Doležal, Thinles Chondol, Zuzana Chlumská, Jan Altman, Kateřina Čapková, Miroslav Dvorský, Pavel Fibich, Kirill A. Korznikov1, Adam T. Ruka1, Martin Kopecký, Martin Macek, Klára Řeháková, Contrasting biomass allocations explain adaptations to cold and drought in the world’s highest-growing angiosperms, Annals of Botany, Volume 134, Issue 3, 1 September 2024, Pages 401–414 https://doi.org/10.1093/aob/mcae028
